changelogversion.changelogtext: [b][font color=red]New![/font] Search treatments for common diseases which can be natural or chemical
[b][font color=red]New![/font] Specify the way you want to search common diseases from Settings
[b][font color=red]New![/font] Search information about E-Substances that can be found on non-physical products
New User Interface giving easy navigation to the basic modules of the app
